name: Broken War
description: A fragment of Stalker's War sword, a symbol of his defeat.

languages.description: Ein Fragment von Stalkers War-Schwert, ein Symbol seiner Niederlage.
languages.name: Zerbrochenes War

languages.description: Un fragment de l'Épée War du Stalker, symbole de sa défaite.
languages.name: War Brisée

languages.description: Un frammento della spada War dello Stalker, un simbolo della sua sconfitta.
languages.name: Broken War

languages.description: 스토커의 검인 워의 파편으로, 스토커의 패배의 상징입니다.
languages.name: 브로큰 워

languages.description: Un fragmento de la espada de guerra de Stalker, un símbolo de su derrota.
languages.name: Broken War

languages.description: （英文：BROKEN-WAR）追猎者的战争之剑的碎片，是其落败的象征。
languages.name: 破碎的战争之剑

languages.description: Фрагмент меча Сталкера «Война», символизирующий его поражение.
languages.name: Осколок Войны

languages.description: Stalkerが使ったWarの破片。彼を討ち倒した証である。
languages.name: Broken War

languages.description: Fragment War, miecza Stalkera, symbol jego porażki.
languages.name: War Strzaskany

languages.description: Um fragmento da espada War do Stalker, um símbolo de sua derrota.
languages.name: War Fragmentada

languages.description: （英文：BROKEN-WAR）Stalker 的戰爭之劍的碎片，是其落敗的象徵。
languages.name: 破碎的戰爭之劍

languages.description: ชิ้นส่วนดาบสงครามของ Stalker สัญลักษณ์แห่งความพ่ายแพ้ของเขา
languages.name: Broken War

languages.description: Stalker'ın War kılıcının bir parçası, aynı zamanda onun yenilgisin bir sembolü
languages.name: Broken War

languages.description: Частина меча «Війна», що стала символом поразки Сталкера.
languages.name: Зломлена Війна
